DOC.brief_summary: This is a double blinded study where 2 test vaccines will be evaluated to see if they protect persons who have never had malaria against malaria infection when bitten by mosquitoes.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy Study of RTS,S AS02A/AS01B Vaccine to Prevent Malaria
DOC.criteria: Be in good general health Be able to participate for 415 months Pregnant or planning pregnancy History of malaria or exposure to malaria in past 12 months Received an investigational malaria vaccine Past history of allergic reaction to previous immunization Positive blood tests for HIV and specific types of hepatitis
